Here's a more detailed and visually appealing README file, inspired by a medium-style article format:

---

# Airbnb Superhost Classification Project

## Introduction
Welcome to the Airbnb Superhost Classification Project. This project aims to classify Airbnb hosts as superhosts or not, based on various characteristics available in the dataset. The goal is to help Airbnb make informed decisions about awarding the superhost badge to hosts, enhancing customer satisfaction and trust.

## Dataset Overview
The dataset contains 26,451 rows and 45 columns, including details about host response time, response rate, acceptance rate, and other host and listing characteristics.
